gameplay_mechanics.name: Gameplay Mechanics
gameplay_mechanics.description: Describes buffs & debuffs applicable to enemies or operators.

ba.stun.name: Stun
ba.stun.description: Unable to move, block, attack, or use skills

ba.buffres.name: Status Resistance
ba.buffres.description: Negative Status durations(Stun, Cold, Freeze, etc.) halved (does not stack with the same effect)

ba.invisible.name: Invisible
ba.invisible.description: Prevents being targeted by enemy attacks if the unit is not blocking

ba.camou.name: Camouflage
ba.camou.description: Prevents being targeted by normal enemy attacks if the unit is not blocking (but will still take Splash damage)

ba.fragile.name: Fragile
ba.fragile.description: Amplifies all Physical, Arts, and True damage taken by the corresponding amount (only the strongest effect of this type applies)

ba.shield.name: Shield
ba.shield.description: Blocks 1 instance of damage per layer of Shield

ba.protect.name: Sanctuary
ba.protect.description: Reduces incoming Physical and Arts damage by the corresponding amount (only the strongest effect of this type applies)

ba.cold.name: Cold
ba.cold.description: Reduces ASPD by 30 and causes subsequent applications of the Cold status during the debuff duration to inflict Frozen

ba.frozen.name: Frozen
ba.frozen.description: Unable to move, attack, or use skills (inflicted through the Cold status); When enemies are frozen, RES -15

ba.sleep.name: Sleep
ba.sleep.description: Invulnerable and unable to take any actions

ba.inspire.name: Inspiration
ba.inspire.description: Increases base stats (only the strongest effect of this type applies for each stat)

ba.binding.name: Tied
ba.binding.description: When the corresponding Tied unit is no longer on the battlefield, this unit's skill immediately ends, SP is set to 0, and SP can no longer be gained

ba.charged.name: Charged
ba.charged.description: Can continue recovering SP after reaching the maximum. When SP reaches double the maximum, enters Charged state. Skills have additional effects when activated in Charged state (All SP will be consumed whenever the skill is activated)

ba.strong.name: Vigor
ba.strong.description: When HP is higher than a certain percentage, increases ATK by the effect percentage (only the highest ATK increase from effects of this type will be applied)

ba.float.name: Low-Altitude Hovering
ba.float.description: Cannot be blocked or attacked by melee attacks

ba.overdrive.name: Overload
ba.overdrive.description: Skill duration has two gauges. Extra effect is triggered when skill duration is halfway complete.

ba.levitate.name: Levitate
ba.levitate.description: Target becomes aerial and cannot move, attack, or use skills. Duration halved if Weight is greater than 3.

ba.physhield.name: Physical Shield
ba.physhield.description: Blocks 1 instance of Physical damage per layer of Physical Shield

ba.magicfragile.name: Arts Fragility
ba.magicfragile.description: Amplifies all Arts damage taken by the corresponding amount (only the strongest effect of this type applies)

ba.dying.name: Critically Wounded
ba.dying.description: Movement Speed reduced, cannot be blocked, dies after 10s, restores SP to the attacker when defeated.

ba.barrier.name: Barrier
ba.barrier.description: Absorbs a certain amount of damage.

ba.weightless.name: Weightless
ba.weightless.description: Weight reduced by 1 level (effects of the same name do not stack)

ba.berserk.name: Tenacity
ba.berserk.description: Increases stats proportionally based on lost HP, reaching the maximum bonus once a certain percentage has been lost (only the strongest effect of this type applies)

ba.steal.name: Steal
ba.steal.description: Reduces the target's base stats while increasing own. The reduction and increase in stats cannot exceed the specified upper limit (only the strongest effect of this type applies)

ba.weaken.name: Enfeeble
ba.weaken.description: Reduces the target's ATK by the corresponding amount (only the strongest effect with this name applies)

ba.epbarrier.name: Protective Barrier
ba.epbarrier.description: Absorbs a certain amount of Elemental Damage.

ba.tremble.name: Frighten
ba.tremble.description: Cannot perform normal attacks when blocked

elemental_damages.name: Elemental Damages
elemental_damages.description: The different types of elemental damages done by enemies or operators.

ba.dt.neural.name: Nervous Impairment
ba.dt.neural.description: After Nervous Impairment reaches 1000, the affected unit takes 1000 True damage and is Stunned for 10s

ba.dt.erosion.name: Corrosion Damage
ba.dt.erosion.description: After Corrosion Damage reaches 1000, the affected unit has its DEF permanently reduced by 100 and takes 800 Physical damage

ba.dt.burning.name: Burn Damage
ba.dt.burning.description: After Burn Damage reaches 1000, the affected unit has its RES reduced by 20 for 10 seconds and takes 1200 Arts damage

ba.dt.element.name: Elemental Damage
ba.dt.element.description: Includes Nervous Impairment, Corrosion Damage, Burn Damage, and Necrosis Damage

ba.dt.apoptosis.name: Necrosis Damage
ba.dt.apoptosis.description: After Necrosis Damage reaches 1000, the affected unit cannot use skills for 15 seconds and every second loses 1 SP and takes 100 Arts damage

ba.dt.apoptosis2.name: Necrosis Damage - Player
ba.dt.apoptosis2.description: Explodes when at max (1000 for Normal and Elite, 2000 for Leaders), inflicting 50%Enfeeble that gradually recovers, and dealing 800 Elemental Damage per second. 15s cooldown.

ba.dt.burning2.name: Burn damage - Ally
ba.dt.burning2.description: Explodes when at max (1000 for Normal and Elite, 2000 for Leaders), dealing 7000 Elemental damage and temporarily inflicting -20 RES. 10s cooldown.

cc.c.abyssal2_1.name: Special Bonus
cc.c.abyssal2_1.description: For every Abyssal Hunter operator stationed in a Factory, the Control Center provides 5% Productivity for every Factory with an Abyssal Hunter operator stationed within it, up to a maximum of 45% Productivity

cc.c.abyssal2_2.name: Special Bonus
cc.c.abyssal2_2.description: For every Abyssal Hunter operator stationed in a Factory, the Control Center provides 10% Productivity for every Factory with an Abyssal Hunter operator stationed within it, up to a maximum of 90% Productivity

cc.c.abyssal2_3.name: Special Interaction Rules
cc.c.abyssal2_3.description:
Takes priority over Cooperative Will, and does not stack
Does not stack with Automation α, Automation β, or Bionic Seadragon, and the 'set to 0' effect will take priority

cc.c.skill.name: Certain Skills
cc.c.skill.description:

Capable Assistance, S.W.E.E.P., Snack Network, Cleaning Agreement, Substitute, Necessary Responsibility, Guarding, Tiny Leader, Self-Absorbed Million Dollar Smile, Marigold Poetry Gathering, Art of Defense

cc.t.strong2.name: Special Interaction Rules
cc.t.strong2.description:
Cannot stack with Heavenly Reward α, Heavenly Reward β, and will take precedence instead
When Heavenly Reward α, Heavenly Reward β stacks with other skills, this skill will take effect on the resulting effect

cc.c.sui2_1.name: Special comparison rules
cc.c.sui2_1.description: Compare hourly Morale recovery totals of other buildings provided by other Operator skills in the Control Center. The strongest effect applies.

cc.t.flow_gold.name: Pure Gold Production Line
cc.t.flow_gold.description: For every Factory producing Pure Gold, Pure Gold Production Line +1

cc.w.ncdeer1.name: Causality
cc.w.ncdeer1.description: Whenever a recipe that consumes 4 or less Morale fails to produce a byproduct, gain 1 point of Causality for every 1 Morale consumed

cc.w.ncdeer2.name: Karma
cc.w.ncdeer2.description: Whenever a recipe that consumes 8 Morale fails to produce a byproduct, gain 1 point of Karma for every 1 Morale consumed

cc.t.accmuguard1.name: Martial Arts
cc.t.accmuguard1.description: Accumulate 1 point when assisting with Specialization training to level 1, 2 points to level 2, and 3 points at level 3, with a maximum accumulation limit of 3 points (cannot be accumulated or consumed when the Trainer's Morale is 0)
